project.label: Project Name
project.help: Basic Memory project name. Created automatically if it doesn't exist.

memoryDir.label: Memory Directory
memoryDir.help: Directory to index into the knowledge graph (relative to workspace)

memoryFile.label: Memory File
memoryFile.help: Working memory file (searched but not indexed into BM)

bmPath.label: BM CLI Path
bmPath.help: Path to the basic-memory CLI binary (default: 'bm')

autoCapture.label: Auto-Capture
autoCapture.help: Automatically index conversation content after each turn

projectPath.label: Project Path
projectPath.help: Filesystem path for Basic Memory project data (relative paths resolve from workspace); created automatically if missing

cloud.label: Cloud Backend
cloud.help: Optional cloud backend config (url + api_key). If present, uses cloud instead of local BM.
